A1: Nations defensive military force , recommended by
RelatedSentence: A special United Nations defensive military force , recommended by Secretary - General Ban Ki - moon to protect UN staff and facilities in Mogadishu , was deployed on Sunday to shore up the world body 's operations in long - troubled Somalia .
The UNGU is made up of 410 troops provided by the Uganda People 's Defense Forces ( UPDF ) .
The Guard Unit , led by a Ugandan Commander , falls under the responsibility of Kay , the UN designated official in Somalia .
